template: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing a realistic end-to-end operational workflow in the {industry} domain that would require coordinating multiple tools, resolving at least one constraint, updating systems, and delivering a final outcome; output only the prompt text and keep it under 40 words.
filled_prompt: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing a realistic end-to-end operational workflow in the manufacturing domain that would require coordinating multiple tools, resolving at least one constraint, updating systems, and delivering a final outcome; output only the prompt text and keep it under 40 words.

message.content: After a quality inspection flags a defective batch, coordinate the MES to halt production, resolve the machine calibration constraint, update the ERP inventory, and schedule the rework order to fulfill the original shipment.
message.reasoning_content:
Hmm, the user wants a concise single-sentence prompt under 40 words describing a realistic manufacturing workflow. It needs to involve multiple tools, constraint resolution, system updates, and a final outcome.

Manufacturing often involves quality checks, production adjustments, and inventory updates. A scenario where a defect is found could tie these elements together naturally. 

The prompt should mention specific tools like inspection software and ERP systems to show coordination. Resolving a constraint like adjusting machine settings adds complexity. Updating inventory and scheduling a rework order ensures a clear outcome.

Keeping it under 40 words means trimming unnecessary details while hitting all the required elements.
